TopicTitle: Sterliron and Iron Star : Rocket-only High-Payload SSTOs

Articles.Content:
Hi all!

It's been a while since I've posted any of my creations on the forum. But today I have two SSTOs that I'm really proud of!

Steliron

The Steliron-class are a staple of the WRSA LKO fleet. The unmanned 20-ton to LKO vehicle runs on only rockets, allowing for easy flight and a 500m/s margin in LKO. You must remember to pump fuel forward before landing, however.

Action Groups

1 - Outer Engines Off

2 - Solar Panels

Download : Coming Soon!

Iron Star

The Iron Star is the Steliron's big brother. Capable of carrying 54 tons to orbit, with a 1200 m/s margin in LKO. Trickier to fly, but a beauty nonetheless.

Download : Coming Soon!

Action Groups 

1 - Solars

2 - Bay

Pics coming when I get back to my desktop.

Edited November 19, 2016 by OrbitalBuzzsaw
